metadata.name: Corvite 150 15 MG 3mL Injection powder for solution

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Used for the treatment of various topical fungal infections including athlete s foot tinea pedis

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Bifonazole is a type of antifungal medicine known as an imidazole It kills fungi and yeasts by interfering with their cell membranes

incompatibilities.description: The metabolism of Lomitapide can be decreased when combined with Bifonazole
The therapeutic efficacy of Amphotericin B can be decreased when used in combination with Bifonazole
Didanosine can cause a decrease in the absorption of Bifonazole resulting in a reduced serum concentration and potentially a decrease in efficacy
The metabolism of Eliglustat can be decreased when combined with Bifonazole
